name: 黃榮堂
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件簡介、電晶體開關電路、數位積體電路及應用、矽控整流子（SCR）、矽控整流子觸發電路、雙向矽控整流器、運算放大器及應用感測器及應用、電動機驅動電路、變頻器電路。
Semiconductor Components, Transistor Switch Circuits, Digital ICs and Application, Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac, Operational Amplifier and Application, Sensor and Application, Drivers for Electrical Machines, and Inverters.
schedule:
Week 1 Semiconductor Components
week 2-3 Transistor Switch Circuits
week 4-5 Operational Amplifier and Application
week 6-8 Silicon-Controlled-Rectifier (SCR), Trigger Circuits for SCR, Triac
week 9 midterm exam
week 10-12 Sensor and Application,
week 13-15  Drivers for Electrical Machines
week  16-17 Inverters
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy:
midterm Exam 30%
final Exam 40%
Home work 15%
Lab 15%
materials: INDUSTRIAL ELECTRONICS 工業電子學 原文書 James A. Rehg & Glenn J. Sartori  高立圖書代理
